official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide that owners of passenger motor vehicles leased to the United States Postal Service shall be exempt from the payment of State taxes and fees on those vehicles.

summary.text: Exempts the owner of any passenger motor vehicle leased by the United States Postal Service from payment of any State or local tax or fee on such vehicle. Authorizes the Postal Service to maintain any such vehicle.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide that owners of passenger motor vehicles leased to the United States Postal Service shall be exempt from the payment of State taxes and fees on those vehicles.
